item.title: GitHub使用笔记--SSH提交异常
item.description: 系统环境：MAC ssh git push 时出现timeout的问题 $ git push ssh: connect to host github.com port 22: Connection timed out fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists. 修改前测试： $ ssh -T git@github.com ssh: connect to host github.com port 22: Operation timed out 修改 ~/.ssh/config 中 github.com 的配置， Hostname 改为 ssh.github.com, Port 改为 443: Host github.com Hostname ssh.github.com Port 443 修改后测试：
